reviews.title: Loved this game untill
reviews.comment: Havw completed the first world twice now and when it downloads china it freezes on me and have to remove t completely and redownlaod game. Here i go again third time is a charm I\'m able to play on my phone at this time but still not my tablet
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: game freezes every few mins when its not being played.when being played it stutters on the reels a bit.cant seem to win anything,then bam!winning for an hour,only to lose next two days.
reviews.author: Holly Summers

reviews.comment: This slot is ok.just ok not great or anything like that it\'s just a solid ok slot\tThis app wil play when it wants to. So if  you  wanna get mad Hella mad.... Download this app for sure!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Uninstalled!!!!!!! 7/2/13. I updated and it is STILL Broken will not open!\tI love this game but, it won\'t open. I updated it twice to try to fix it, no go... The scratch card needs bugs fixed too. When I could open it, I would get the same card for weeks, sometimes it will be scratched off completely for weeks. It will erase my scratches too.
reviews.author: Amanda Bishop

reviews.title: Katleemeow
reviews.comment: I got to the islands, 2nd place,it would not let me go to the 3rd. Now I\'m starting ALL OVER AGAIN!!!!      9/9/13 i just put the game on my new phone &&& I have to start all over again!?!?!?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Would do no stars if i could i had this game for over s year..loved this game but ever since the new update it wont even open.  When you try to open it all it does is show a black screen then closes.  I had to uninstall and i had built up substantial monies...guess i won\'t be paying.

reviews.title: fix!
reviews.comment: I have been playing this game for years. eversince last update all I get is a black screen and force close. please fix

reviews.title: Have to start all over
reviews.comment: Got to Transylvania and it froze turned off the phone turned back on and have to start from the beginning thats BS i am going to delete this game
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Would give it no stars if I could since it don\'t work!!!
reviews.comment: I had this game before so I tried to transfer my coins... no such luck but that is not the  real problem, I have a lot of games that I had to start over. This game is also slow starting out you can purchase tons of coins but if you can\'t spend them during the game it makes no sense.
reviews.author: Yolanda Nelson

reviews.title: Up for 2nd uninstalling dont think so
reviews.comment: Good game if it well open twice now I have almost finished islands all of a sudden can\'t open game waisted weeks of playing lost hundred+pocket change by uninstalling and reinstalling don\'t think I will bother this time

reviews.title: Fun Game
reviews.comment: Good game but I was all the way to Transylvania n I got a new phone so now I\'m in Egypt again but will keep going lol

reviews.comment: Great game but it could bonus more often. I play it on my kindel also and I have reached Australia but it is a long time coming. I do recommend it you have patience.

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: Fun game so far. I haven\'t really gotten to know how good it will be yet.
reviews.author: Dave Edwards

reviews.title: Not really happy
reviews.comment: When I changed to a new tablet I lost everything and had to start over.....also, why can\'t this game accumulate points while the tablet is off line?  It\'s not possible for me to be on 24/7 while traveling.  I love this game and would give it a 5 star rating if these two items were fixed.
